full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS @011A *, ,SKYONG LCAM SRING GIS RTZA BRGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BZHES, AER TE NI TZAS BZANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, SKYABS GNAS DAM DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS THA SHAL PA RGYUD RGYAL BU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD DANG LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS KYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS RTZE BAS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS PAR CUNG ZAD DAG YON NA 'DI BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU LAM ZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,)
